caption:
This photograph captures a moment of scientific fieldwork beside a river. The setting is a bright, sunny day with clear skies. Two men are featured prominently in the image, engaged in water monitoring activities.

The man in the foreground is focused on a small, boxy instrument, possibly a data logger or measurement device, that he is holding in his hands. He wears a dark shirt and eyeglasses, and his attention is concentrated on the device.

The man in the background is squatting near the water's edge. He is wearing a light-colored shirt and dark pants, possibly jeans. He appears to be collecting a water sample or possibly adjusting equipment in the water, as he reaches toward the surface.

The background shows a dense tree line on the opposite bank of the river, suggesting a remote or natural location. The river itself is calm with some small ripples on the surface, reflecting the sunlight. Rocks and boulders are visible at the waterâ€™s edge where the men are working, adding a rugged texture to the scene.

Overall, the image depicts a focused, professional environmental study or sampling effort, highlighting the men's active engagement in environmental science or river ecology.
title: California fish and game biologists take water samples from the Colorado river at "goose flats" in the Palo Verde Valley
